DESCRIPTION: This card remains when played, separate from your hand. Upon meeting its conditions, it will activate its effects, and can be activated up to the amount of uses it has. After all uses, it will be returned.
When an #yExperiment card is used up and removes itself from play.
When an #yExperiment card meets its conditions and activates its effects.
The amount of uses an #yExperiment card has left.
